channel.title: [Runesource] Making players NOT clipped?
channel.description:
So what I'm trying to do is make a mode for admins so that when they click the minimap, they will teleport to that position.
This is what I have in my WalkToPacketHandler.java
[code=java] if (packet.getOpcode() == MINI_MAP_WALK && player.potatoOn == true) { //potatoOn is the mode for minimap teleporting player.teleport(new Position(firstStepX, firstStepY)); return; } [/code]
When I set the mode to be on, the teleporting works, except for one thing. The teleport still checks for clipping, so you can't go past walls, or through objects.
I was wondering if someone out there who knows what I'm talking about could help me?
It would be [b]greatly[/b] appreciated.

item.title: [Runesource] Making players NOT clipped?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

It’s a client sided command, not server sided.

Read full topic

item.title: [Runesource] Making players NOT clipped?
item.dc:creator: @sorecheeny sorecheeny
item.description:
@sorecheeny wrote:

Shame there’s no ::noclip command in my source.

Read full topic

item.title: [Runesource] Making players NOT clipped?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

I’m pretty sure the reason this happens is that even when using the minimap, the client uses its own pathfinding algorithm before sending it to the server. Try using ::noclip as an admin to disable client sided clipping and then using the teleport mode. Note that some clients have ::noclip removed, or your source might automatically kick people that try to use the noclip command.

Read full topic

item.title: [Runesource] Making players NOT clipped?
item.dc:creator: @sorecheeny sorecheeny
item.description:
@sorecheeny wrote:

So what I’m trying to do is make a mode for admins so that when they click the minimap, they will teleport to that position.

This is what I have in my WalkToPacketHandler.java

        if (packet.getOpcode() == MINI_MAP_WALK && player.potatoOn == true) { //potatoOn is the mode for minimap teleporting
            player.teleport(new Position(firstStepX, firstStepY));
            return;
        }

When I set the mode to be on, the teleporting works, except for one thing. The teleport still checks for clipping, so you can’t go past walls, or through objects.

I was wondering if someone out there who knows what I’m talking about could help me?

It would be greatly appreciated.

Read full topic
